bibl.bibl: Smith, Frederick. 1863b. Descriptions of Brazilian honey bees belonging to the genera Melipona and Trigona, which were exhibited, together with samples of their honey and wax, in the Brazilian Court of the International Exhibition of 1862. [Read 2 March 1863.] Transactions of the Entomological Society of London 3d ser. 1 (1862–4): 497–512.
